name: miner
description: Automated mining turtle module for the Mint framework
author: aceh
usage:
To use the miner module:
1. Run 'miner' to start mining
2. Configure settings in mint:config('miner.env')
3. Monitor mining progress with 'miner status'
changelog:
1.0.0 - Initial release
- Added basic mining functionality
- Support for tunnel state tracking
- Automated mining patterns

name: tunnel
description: Tunnel state management for mining operations
author: aceh
usage:
To use the tunnel module:
1. Run 'tunnel init' to initialize a new tunnel
2. Use mint:config('tunnel.state') to access tunnel state

name: courier
description: Item transportation system between mining sites and storage
author: aceh
usage:
The courier module requires tunnel to be installed.
To use:
1. Run 'courier start' to begin transportation
2. Configure routes in mint:config('courier.env')
